mcq.statement: Herpes is a virus that enters the human body and remains dormant in the nervous system until it produces an outbreak, without any particular reason. Which of the following statements correctly describes herpes?

options.a: Herpes integrates itself into the DNA of the cell.
options.b: While it remains dormant in the nervous system, the virus is in its lysogenic cycle.
options.c: During an outbreak, the virus is in the lytic cycle.
